ITEM.NAME: Tortellini
ITEM.DESC: Shaped strips of pasta filled with pork and mortadella. Served dry with panna or in brodo.
ITEM.DESC_MATERIAL: pork, mortadella, ham, eggs, parmisan, flour 00
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Mix pork, ham, mortadella, parmisan and eggs; rest for 20 hours. Shape 4x4xcm squares with filling; fold them.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Boil them briefly, not too long time.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Also in brodo a few of parmisan leaves a great tast.

ITEM.NAME: Lasagna
ITEM.DESC: Stacked squares of pasta stuffed with bolognese ragù and bechamel.
ITEM.DESC_MATERIAL: bolognese ragù, bechamel, eggs, parmisan, flour 00
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Flatten the roll of pasta. Cut the roll in 10x15cm strips.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Boil the strips of pasta till they pop up on the top; wash and dry. Put them on backing tin covering with ragù and bechamel sause; cover with the next strip, etc.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Serve with a few of parmisan that leaves a great taste.

ITEM.NAME: Tagliatelle
ITEM.DESC: Wide strips of pasta served with panna or more commonly ragù.
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Roll the pastry not too tight and then flatten the roll. Cut the roll in 8mm strips; dry them for a few hours.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: While finishing cooking the bolognese ragù boil the pasta, not too long time.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Serve the pasta, with a few ragù and parmisan on the top.

ITEM.NAME: Tigelle
ITEM.DESC: Shaped pastry sandwitches stuffed with salami, ham, mortadella and/or cheese.
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Combine milk and water with yeast; then mix flour salt and oil till you get a smooth dough; rest for 2 hours.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Cut the dough in disks; cook the tigelle 4 min each side.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Serve and fill them with abundant salami and cheese.

ITEM.NAME: Spuma di mortadella
ITEM.DESC: Toasts served with a creamy mix of martadella and cheese on the top.
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Finely mince the mortadella; mix with ricotta, cream and parmesan.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Serve on a toast with an olive on the top.

ITEM.NAME: Friggione
ITEM.DESC: Stuffed vegetarian soup based on onions and fresh tomatos that sometimes you can find also in chily version.
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Smoothly cut the honions and leve them rest with salt and sugar; for 2 hours.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Add chopped tomatoes and coook in a pan till sauce is tasty
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Serve with meat or fish, friggione is always great.

ITEM.NAME: Rise cake
ITEM.DESC: Delicate brown cake based on rise and candied citroen.
ITEM.DESC_MATERIAL: milk, rise, sugar, eggs, candied citron. almond liqueur
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Beat the eggs with sugar, candies and liqueur
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Boil the milk and rise with grated lemon, salt and sugar. Cook everything in backing tin.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Golen and crisp server with some vanilla sugar on the top.

ITEM.NAME: Carbonara
ITEM.DESC: Hot spaghetti plate scattered with egg sauce and pepper.
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Brown the strips of bacon in pot
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Boil the spaghetti just enough, "al dente". Dry them and mix with eggs and bacon.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Serve with parmisan and pepper as topping.

ITEM.NAME: Ravioli ricotta and spinach
ITEM.DESC: Shaped pasta envelopes filled with ricotta cheese and spinach.
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Mix ricotta spinach, eggs, parmisan, pepper and nutmeg. Shape 5x5cm squares with filling; fold them joying two layers.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Boil them briefly, not too long time.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Parmisan or tomato sauce to leave a great taste.

ITEM.NAME: Tenerina cake
ITEM.DESC: Soft dark cake based on chocolate.
ITEM.DESC_MATERIAL: chocolate, butter, eggs, sugar, milk, flour 00
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Beat the eggs yolks with sugar and flour. Beat the eggs whites with salt.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Melt chocolate with butter. Then mix with the eggs creams. Bake the cake 25-30min

ITEM.NAME: Castagnacci
ITEM.DESC: Small dark cakes based on chestnuts.
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Heat the raisins in the water in spoon of vinsanto. Mix flour, salt, water adding the raisins and nuts.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Make 6x6cm cakes in the baking tin over and drizzled with oil. Cook for 25-30 min
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Serve topping with the remaining nuts.

ITEM.NAME: Tortelli di zucca
ITEM.DESC: Shaped strips of pasta filled with pampkin. Served dry with panna or tomato sauce.
ITEM.DESC_PREPARATION: Mix pumpkin, amaretto bisquits, cheese and nutmeg. Shape 5x5cm squares with filling; fold them joying two layers.
ITEM.DESC_COOKING: Boil them briefly, not too long time.
ITEM.DESC_SERVING: Parmisan or tomato sauce to leave a great taste.
